meaning: A feeling or state of intense excitement and happiness
A state of being calm (peaceful and untroubled)
The capacity to recover quickly from difficulties; toughness
The state of being alone (often by choice) without loneliness
Playfully quaint or fanciful especially in an appealing and amusing way
The quality of being thankful; readiness to show appreciation
A sudden realization or moment of great insight
The desire to do good to others; kindness
Extremely delicate and light; otherworldly in beauty
A sentimental longing or affection for the past
Having mixed or contradictory feelings about something or someone
The quality of being determined and persistent
Continuing an effort despite difficulty or delay in achieving success
A strong desire to achieve or succeed
A state of pleasantly being lost in daydreams
An overwhelming feeling of great happiness or excitement
Courage in facing pain or adversity
An imagined place where everything is perfect
